issue.title: From Source (Ubuntu and Mac) tutorial build in /tmp confusing

content.raw: I think we could just tell users to install somewhere else, like `~/` or `~/code`. Besides the uninstall issue above, people who are installing from source often want to make changes to the software and contribute them back, but if it's under `/tmp` all will be wiped out.
content.html: I think we could just tell users to install somewhere else, like ~/ or ~/code. Besides the uninstall issue above, people who are installing from source often want to make changes to the software and contribute them back, but if it's under /tmp all will be wiped out.
